page.title: 07tourism in Saffron Walden
page.content: There are a lot of tourists in Saffron Walden. We do not have anything big and important like the colleges in Cambridge or the Tower of London. People come to Saffron Walden to see what a small traditional market town looks like. We do have the largest parish church in Essex. Apart from this people like to walk around the narrow streets in the centre of the town. They look at the timber-framed buildings in the old part especially the ones with jettied upper stories sticking out. The area is also famous for pargetting (next page).The more the town's population expands the less it is like what they imagine old market towns to be. It must be boring to see so many estate agents and building societies.
